dict.string:
on alfred_script(q) tell application "WezTerm" activate end tell
-- Open floating tmux terminal (ALT+s in nvim) -- ESC+s is the terminal escape sequence for ALT+s do shell script "printf '\\033s' | /Applications/WezTerm.app/Contents/MacOS/wezterm cli send-text --no-paste"
-- Wait 300ms for terminal to open delay 0.3
-- Send the command do shell script "/Applications/WezTerm.app/Contents/MacOS/wezterm cli send-text --no-paste -- " & quoted form of (q & linefeed) end alfred_script
